painPoints: Exhausted from years of yo-yo dieting with nothing that sticks long-term
No energy - tired all the time even with enough sleep
Feeling invisible and dismissed, especially by doctors who say 'just lose weight'
Worried about aging - watching parents deal with preventable health issues
Wanting to feel strong and capable again, not just 'less bad'
Helping friends and family with health advice for free but no professional framework or income
Blood sugar crashes, brain fog, afternoon slumps that coffee can't fix
terminology: Lifestyle medicine - evidence-based approach using nutrition, movement, sleep, and stress management to prevent and reverse chronic conditions
D.E.P.T.H. Method - Discover, Educate, Plan, Track, Habits framework for health coaching
5 Pillars of Metabolic Health - Blood sugar stability, quality nutrition, restorative movement, sleep optimization, stress resilience
Blood sugar balance - maintaining stable glucose levels to prevent energy crashes, cravings, and metabolic dysfunction
Sustainable habits - small consistent changes that compound into lasting transformation
Holistic wellness - addressing the whole person, not just diet or exercise in isolation
Scope of practice - guide lifestyle changes without diagnosing conditions or replacing medical care
clientExamples: Women 40-55 who've tried every diet and are ready for something sustainable
Busy moms exhausted from putting everyone else first and neglecting their own health
Women in perimenopause experiencing weight gain, fatigue, and feeling like their body has betrayed them
Pre-diabetic or metabolic syndrome diagnoses looking to reverse through lifestyle
Anyone tired of the diet industry's quick fixes who wants to actually understand their body
practiceType: Health and wellness coaching focused on nutrition, lifestyle habits, sustainable weight management, and metabolic health optimization
